title: Business As Usual
description: Multi-tenant ASP.NET Core business suite with contributor-proof onboarding, Smart Commit synergy, and CI/CD orchestration. Features include AWS EC2/RDS provisioning, changelog automation, badge injection, and modular admin dashboards.

admin (web).title: Dashboard
admin (web).desc: This is the landing page after login. It displays system vitals (web server, database, etc.).

admin (web).title: Collapsed Sidebar
admin (web).desc: Sidebar can be expanded and collapsed to extend the work area view. Collapsed sidebar shows action icons.

admin (web).title: Expanded Sidebar
admin (web).desc: Sidebar can be expanded and collapsed to extend the work area view. Expanded sidebar shows action icons and labels.

admin (web).title: Provision Company
admin (web).desc: This screen is used to initiate the database generation for a tenant company (client).

admin (web).title: View Companies
admin (web).desc: Lists all provisioned companies with action links to modify setups.

admin (web).title: Retro Theme
admin (web).desc: One of a few themes available (based on colors chosen in another project (NEXTRiff).

admin (web).title: Contributor Mode Theme
admin (web).desc: One of a few themes available (based on colors chosen in another project (portfolio-ts).

client (web).title: Dashboard
client (web).desc: Landing page after login. Displays all (allowed) modules, based on roles.

client (web).title: New Hire Onboarding
client (web).desc: Multi-part information entry screen for gathering new employee details.

client (web).title: Employee Directory
client (web).desc: List of employees with contact information.

client (web).title: Benefits Management
client (web).desc: Toggle benefits offered by the company. May also be used to toggle benefits for a particular employee.

client (web).title: Hazard Dark Theme
client (web).desc: One of many themes offered. All themes have light and dark variants.

client (web).title: Emerald Light Theme
client (web).desc: One of many themes offered. All themes have light and dark variants.

client (web).title: Responsive Layout
client (web).desc: The application is fully responsive, but there are going to be complete, native (Android/iOS) mobile versions of the software.

client (android).title: Dashboard
client (android).desc: Landing page after login. Displays all (allowed) modules, based on roles.

client (android).title: Hazard Theme
client (android).desc: One of many themes offered. All themes have light and dark variants.

client (android).title: Steel Theme
client (android).desc: One of many themes offered. All themes have light and dark variants.

title: NEXTRiff
description: A tab-parsing and music metadata platformâ€”backend nearly complete, frontend in progress. Soon, musicians everywhere will have a backstage pass to crank out lively jams.

web client.title: Splash Screen
web client.desc: Intro graphic and sound prior to viewing the home page.

web client.title: Help
web client.desc: Help page. Layout is ready, no content as of yet.

web client.title: About
web client.desc: Page explaining the purpose of the site.

web client.title: Workspace (Empty)
web client.desc: Workspace is the primary section of the site. It is where files and settings are accessed.

web client.title: Left Menu
web client.desc: Acts as a file menu. You can start a new file, open an existing file, save, view and change settings, etc.

web client.title: Settings
web client.desc: There are only a small handful of settings, but they are useful.

web client.title: Instruments and Tuning
web client.desc: This is where you set up the instrument that you want to encode music for. Currently, it is limited to stringed instruments.

web client.title: Score and Measure
web client.desc: These allow for manipulation to the overall score (Clef, Time Signature, Key Signature, etc.).

web client.title: Fretboard Input Tool
web client.desc: Button representation of a stringed instrument's strings and frets. Pressing a button selects it to be used in the note or chord entry process.

web client.title: Keyboard Input tool
web client.desc: Button representation of a piano keyboard. Pressing a button selects it to be used in the note or chord entry process.

web client.title: Playback Controls
web client.desc: Not yet implemented, but eventually, the score will be playable through midi output.

web client.title: Adding Chords with Fretboard
web client.desc: Simply click a button to toggle a note on a specific string and fret. You can submit a single note, or keep adding notes to submit a chord.

web client.title: Adding Notes with Keyboard
web client.desc: Simply click a button to toggle a note. Tab representation on note placement is calculated. You can submit a single note, or keep adding notes to submit a chord.

web client.title: File Rename
web client.desc: When you create or open a file, the title is displayed in the tab panel. double clicking, or right-mouse-menu will allow you to change the filename.

web client.title: Staff Representation
web client.desc: The software defaults to Tab Notation, but you can toggle between Tab, Staff, or Combination that shows both.

web client.title: Combined Notation
web client.desc: The software defaults to Tab Notation, but you can toggle between Tab, Staff, or Combination that shows both.

web client.title: Slate Theme
web client.desc: One of many themes offered. All themes have light and dark variants.

web client.title: Red Theme
web client.desc: One of many themes offered. All themes have light and dark variants.

title: Portfolio Site
description: A handcrafted personal showcase built with Next.js, TypeScript, and SCSS Modules. Features breadcrumb-aware routing, modular layouts, animated transitions, dynamic project pages, screenshot galleries, and a theme-aware UI system.

title: Services By Friends
description: A contributor-friendly service directory with dynamic sidebar, partial views, and off-canvas navigation. Built for onboarding clarity.

title: ThemeSwitcher
description: A lightweight theme toggler with animated transitions and contributor-mode clarity. Designed for plug-and-play integration.

title: BetterBlog
description: A Markdown-powered blog engine with breadcrumb-aware routing and modular layout. Designed for expressive writing and future series support.
